clinical_study.brief_title: Pirfenidone Capsule in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease G2 and G3a Study on Safety and Pharmacokinetics
clinical_study.official_title: Pirfenidone Capsule in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease G2 and G3a Study on Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Single Dose

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetic characteristics of pirfenidone capsules in chronic kidney disease G2 and G3a patients, and to provide a basis for the phase II clinical trial program

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

arm_group.description: Patients with chronic kidney disease take pirfenidone capsule 400mg once orally
Healthy subjects take pirfenidone capsule 400mg once orally

intervention.description: In the patient group, pirfenidone capsule was taken orally once for 400mg
Healthy subjects took pirfenidone capsule 400mg once orally
